column1: SPN 302 SPANISH LITERATURE II: THE ENLIGHTENMENT TO THE PRESENT

A critical survey of Spanish peninsular literature from 1700 to the present: this course provides an overview of the historical, intellectual, artistic, and socio-political factors that have shaped Spanish life from the Enlightenment to our times as viewed through selected literary texts. (Literature category #2: Spanish literature from 1700 to present). SPN 106 or equivalent, including placement test or permission of instructor, is recommended.
